login.title: User main data
login.recoveryYourAccountDescription: Provide the email address associated with your account and we will send you an email with the necessary instructions to reset your password. Keep your account secure and regain access to it in a few steps. Recover your password easily and safely!
login.enterYourNewPasswordDescription: Enter a new password to regain access to your account and protect your information. Follow the simple steps to reset your password and ensure secure access to your account. Regain control of your account now!
